text: Energy and Mineral Resources Division () is a Bangladesh government division under the Ministry of Power, Energy and Mineral Resources responsible for managing hydrocarbon mining and processing in Bangladesh. Abu Hena Md. Rahmatul Muneem is the Secretary in charge of the division. ==History== Energy and Mineral Resources Division was established in 1998 under the Ministry of Power, Energy and Mineral Resources. ==References== Category:1998 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government departments of Bangladesh Category:Government divisions of Bangladesh
title: Energy and Mineral Resources Division
